mapper.insert: INSERT INTO KEYWAR.MEMBER (MID, MPW, MNAME, MTELNO, MEMAIL, MAREA, MINTRO, MDATE, MSPORTS, MTYPE) VALUES(#{param1}, #{param2}, #{param3}, #{param4}, #{param5}, #{param6}, #{param7}, now(), #{param8}, #{param9})

INSERT INTO KEYWAR.CUSTOMER (CSEX, CAGE, CHEIGHT, CWEIGHT, CWCLASS, MEMBER_MSEQNO) VALUES(#{param1}, #{param2}, #{param3}, #{param4}, #{param5}, (SELECT M.MSEQNO FROM KEYWAR.MEMBER AS M WHERE M.MID = #{param6}))
INSERT INTO TIMETABLE (MEMBER_MSEQNO, TTIMETABLE1, TTIMETABLE2) VALUES ((select mSeqno from keyWar.member where mId = #{param1}), #{param2}, #{param3})
INSERT INTO GYM (GNUMBER, GADDRESS, GRENTALPRICE, MEMBER_MSEQNO) VALUES (#{param1}, #{param2}, #{param3}, (select mSeqno from keyWar.member where mId = #{param4}))
mapper.select: select mId from keyWar.member where mId = #{param1} and mPw = #{param2}
select mId from KeyWar.member where mName = #{param1} and mTelno = #{param2} and mEmail = #{param3};
select mPw from KeyWar.member where mId = #{param1} and mName = #{param2} and mTelno = #{param3} and mEmail = #{param4};
